attributes.action: Let's Make Model Guns Available For Collectors
attributes.additional_details:
I believe people of safe mind and body who want to collect Model Guns "Replica Firearms" should be able to under the VCR 2006 act if they apply for a license that shows they do not have any criminal convictions and that they will be sensible with them.

Do not let a few bad apples ruin it for the people like us who wish to collect and display in our private residence Model Guns.

If we were under a licence/database the Law could see who owned them so they could target anybody who did step out of line.

Let us own Model Guns under a safe umbrella of Government control not for Model Guns to be banned outright, or only available to TV corporations or Air-soft teams.
